p: HCoEpiCs were seeded in flask overnight and subsequently incubated with various concentrations (1, 10, and 100 μg/mL) of essential oil of AL and LPS (10 μg/mL) for 24, 48, and 72 h respectively. The cell supernatants were collected (the cells were used for Western blotting analysis). The concentrations of IL-4, IL-6, IL-8, IL-12, IL-1 β, TNF- α, and NO were determined by ELISA according to the manufacturer's instructions.
